attributes.action: Reduce the Road Fund Licence and encourage Insurance Companies to reduce Premiums for low annual mileage drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Pensioners or light local Business Users of vehicles are having to pay the same Insurance and Road Fund Licences (in respect of category of vehicle used) as Company Drivers travelling 20/30/40 thousand miles a year. I suggest that this is an injustice.
